events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but I would like to request a refund because the size does not fit and the jacket is uncomfortable.
The issue has been classified under the Refund cluster due to the customer's request for money back on a purchased item.
An agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the customer's order involving the jacket purchase.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your jacket. I'm here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and the reason for the return so we can process the refund smoothly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I want a refund because the jacket is too large and the material feels rough on my skin.
We have initiated the refund process for your order 123456789. Please ship the jacket back within 7 days, and we will credit your payment once we receive the item.
Thank you for the quick response! I appreciate the clear instructions and will send the jacket back as soon as possible.
We have received your returned jacket and processed your refund successfully. The amount should appear in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to confirm that you have received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been processed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
